info.name: Tricky Temptations
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and under CC BY 3.0:
* Card Joker: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/card-joker.html
* Skull crossed bones: https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/skull-crossed-bones.html

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:
* Posada Pinata: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/flat-design-posada-pinata_10888336.htm
* Abstract Shapes Background: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/hand-drawn-abstract-shapes-background_18300970.htm
info.description: Take tricks as late as possible to score big points, but not so late that you lose it all!

clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number
